meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the Board President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Assistant General Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of January 28, 2025, DPFC Board Meeting.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Disclosure of any relationships by DPFC Board members.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Fencing and Security
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding the fencing and security for 9999 Technology Blvd, Dallas TX.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for HSR LBJ
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for HSR LBJ.
agenda_items.presenter: Sam McDaniel, Kevin Hickman, Gio Lincon, Summer Greathouse, Braxton Parsons

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Burnett Lofts
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Burnett Lofts.
agenda_items.presenter: Sam McDaniel, Hunt Neurohr, Summer Greathouse, Braxton Parsons

agenda_items.title: Renegotiated Terms for The Cedars
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of renegotiated terms for The Cedars - Power and Light.

agenda_items.title: Feedback on Policy Changes
agenda_items.description: Discussion on providing feedback regarding proposed changes to Policy, Operations, and Bylaws.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Report of Hiring Committee
agenda_items.description: Monthly report from the DPFC Staff Hiring Committee.

agenda_items.title: Monitoring Procedures Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on DPFC-owned property monitoring procedures.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Excess Funds
agenda_items.description: Discussion of the use of DPFC excess funds.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Website Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC website.

agenda_items.title: DPFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Briefing and discussion on the DPFC pipeline report.
